title: Rito pls I have 486 RP, I just need one for Arctic Ops Kennen D:
body:
I've always wanted Kennen MD, or any Kennen skin for that matter, he's my favorite little ball of glee and fur and so I have pain painstakingly spent 20 minutes in MS Paint with a mouse and dreams of getting that fabled 1 RP in hopes to buy a Kennen skin before the sale is over.
I'm not good at legs, or art for that matter.
Pls based rito :D

replies.body: I'd have given you an RP~ well done my friend!

Based Baconposter
yey
My first thread is complete.
Baconhawk I recently asked for RP to buy Arclight Vel and the Rioter told me it was against the rules? D:
I just want to get battlecast kog maw but im so far away lol

~~_just your average american_~~

dude you are like filling the stereotype
They have given a lot more RP for a lot less effort, you will get what you deserve my friend!
I had to draw the Mona Lisa to get my RP...
RITO HELP THIS MAN PLS

ERHMAGHERD THANK YOU BASED RITO
MY PLEASURES HAVE BEEN MET

SADLY THE SKIN IS NO LONGER ON SALE, BUT I'LL PUT THIS 1RP TO GOOD USE I TELL YOU WHAT
Doesn't the skin go on sale tomorrow?

D: I ALREADY SPENT IT
Oh well, I went ahead and gave Rito more of my money and bought the Fizz Chroma and Karate Kennen

lol
well at least everyone is kind of happy in the end 
ya for compromise!
Legs lol
they should let us gift already paid for RP. i can only buy you an rp bundle....thats BS! Why can't i just gift somebody 1 RP?????

> [{quoted}](name=ToiletteOfDoom ,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=KYZhtWgZ,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-05-01T14:48:05.239+0000)
>
> they should let us gift already paid for RP. i can only buy you an rp bundle....thats BS! Why can't i just gift somebody 1 RP?????

Because Gold Sellers that's why.
huh?

> [{quoted}](name=ToiletteOfDoom ,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=KYZhtWgZ,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2015-05-01T17:12:44.343+0000)
>
> huh?

If gold sellers are able to trade already bought RP they can "sell" it through third party sites for a higher amount than that which they bought it for. It sounds crazy that people would buy RP that way when they could get it cheaper but they do.
Alternatively, they will make a huge number of accounts and have bots level them to abuse the free RP you get from leveling and sell it for less than Riot charges.

i got it twice 
akali
http://postimg.org/image/ubfuisohn/
and i cant find my cait...

> [{quoted}](name=Rohirrim,realm=EUNE,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=KYZhtWgZ,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-05-01T13:04:17.710+0000)
>
> i got it twice 
> akali
> http://postimg.org/image/ubfuisohn/
> and i cant find my cait...

Oh, oh my...

I genuinely hope you got a free skin or something of that calibre for all that effort.
i got rp twice from riot :D
You have to send them a support ticket i believe.

> [{quoted}](name=Xavkul,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=KYZhtWgZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-01T01:43:01.255+0000)
>
> You have to send them a support ticket i believe.

How do?  :O
I just need ONE MORE RP
click the support button at the top of the page. good luck! hopefully it gets through before the sale ends. its generally a one time deal, though.
I've never actually done this before, hoping for the best
Fucking beautiful.
Love the "legs" part. But save what RP you have now. Arctic Ops, Swamp, ect... are just chromas now. If you can way for a bit, you might see you can get two or three for close to the same price.
Upvoted for whoosh, really makes the image "pop," y'know.
Commit seppuku
Get a fucking life

Actually I have a job, I manufacture high temperature paint baking ovens for companies that make cars and planes and what have you.
I just didn't wanna drop another 5$ into my account just to be left with more RP Scraps.

Why so hostile?
